title: Customer Service Representative
tagsAndSkills: Communication Skills,Pressure Handling,Excel,Time Management,Written Communication,Business Communication Skills,Management Skills,Leadership Skills

ambitionBoxData.Title: Sutherland Global Services Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
** Join Our Dynamic Team as a Customer Service Representative! **

Location: Chennai

CTC: Up to 3 LPA

Shift: Night Shift


Are you passionate about delivering exceptional customer experiences? Do you have excellent communication skills and a willingness to work in a dynamic environment? If so, we want YOU to join our team!

Position: Customer Service Representative


What We Offer:

Competitive CTC up to 3 LPA

Opportunity to work with a leading company in a vibrant location

Professional growth and career advancement

Supportive and inclusive work environment


Key Responsibilities:

Handle customer inquiries and resolve issues promptly and efficiently

Provide accurate information about our products and services

Maintain detailed records of customer interactions

Collaborate with team members to enhance customer satisfaction


Requirements:

Education: Undergraduate (UG) Freshers from the 2023 and 2024 batches Postgraduates (PG) are also welcome.

Skills: Excellent communication skills are a MUST

Availability: Willingness to work night shifts


Why Join Us?

Be part of a dynamic and growing team in Navi Mumbai's thriving business hub

Gain hands-on experience in customer support and build a rewarding career

Enjoy a positive and engaging workplace culture that values your contributions


How to Apply: Interested candidates are invited to send their resumes to Mahima.lohia@sutherlandglobal.com.


Be sure to highlight your communication skills and any relevant experiences. Unlock Your Potential with Us!


Apply Now and Start Your Journey in Customer Support!
